welcome.title: Welcome to MediaGrab!
welcome.description: Download videos and audio from YouTube, Vimeo, Twitter, and many more platforms.

url.title: Paste a URL
url.description: Paste the URL of the video you want to download. Use Ctrl+V for quick paste.

queue.title: Download Queue
queue.description: Add multiple videos and download them in sequence. Click the queue icon in the top right to manage.

history.title: Download History
history.description: Track all your downloads. Redownload from history or open files directly.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Customize theme, language, cookie settings, and more.

emptyState.title: Ready to Download
emptyState.description: Paste a video URL to get started

errors.privateVideo: This video is private or requires sign-in.
errors.regionLocked: This video is not available in your region.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.notFound: Video not found. Please check the URL.
errors.folderNotAccessible: Cannot write to selected folder. Please choose a different location.

suggestions.privateVideo: Try enabling browser cookie import to access content you have legitimate access to.
suggestions.ageRestricted: Enable browser cookie import in settings to verify your age.
suggestions.regionLocked: This content is restricted based on your location.
suggestions.networkError: Check your internet connection and try again.
suggestions.notFound: The video may have been removed or the URL may be incorrect.

cookies.title: This content may require authentication.
cookies.description: Try enabling cookie import from your browser to access private, age-restricted, or subscription content you have legitimate access to.

queue.title: Download Queue
queue.emptyDescription: Add videos to the queue to download them

history.title: Download History
history.emptyDescription: Your completed downloads will appear here

settings.title: Settings
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults?
settings.cookiesDescription: Use cookies to access private or age-restricted content
settings.cookiesFileDescription: Netscape format cookies.txt file. Takes priority over browser cookies.
settings.cookiesFileOverride: Browser cookies are not used when a cookies file is selected
settings.embedSubtitlesDescription: Automatically embed available subtitles into downloaded videos
settings.checkUpdates: Check for yt-dlp updates on startup
settings.checkAppUpdatesOnStartup: Check for app updates on startup
settings.filenameTemplateDescription: Customize the output filename format. Leave empty for default.

missingExecutables.title: Missing Required Files
missingExecutables.description: Some required executable files are missing. The application may not work correctly.
